explains: adj. 粉的；粉状的；布满粉状物的
wordGroup: powdery mildew 白粉病；白粉菌

sentences.en: A couple of inches of dry, powdery snow had fallen.
sentences.cn: 降下了好几英寸厚的粉状干雪。

sentences.en: The leaves have yellow areas on the top and underneath are powdery orange spots.
sentences.cn: 叶子上端有黄色斑块，下方有粉状橙色斑点。

sentences.en: Its surface was powdery and sprinkled with grains of black dust.
sentences.cn: 月球的表面是粉状的，上面散布着一些黑色的尘土。
